data.name: Micro Wars
data.detailed_description:
Micro Wars condenses the classic real time strategy (RTS) formula down into a small, compact form. Matches are on a small scale, lasting less than 10 minutes and typically with only 4-5 units on the map per faction at any given time.

Positioning is key: the hex grid, terrain bonuses, unit counters, and units only being able to fire when stationary means that matches play out much like a chaotic, real time version of speed chess or other turn based games.

Pick from over 8 unique commanders, each with a special twist on gameplay and a unique ability. Maybe, you’ll pick Elias, the mechanic, who can research new units faster and cheaper than his comrades and can call down a healing beam to replenish his depleted forces. Perhaps you’ll choose Voltaire, the master tactician, who gets double the defensive terrain benefits and can construct a temporary bunker anywhere on the battlefield. Or, you prefer to rule the skies with Estelle, the flying ace, who’s aircraft carry heavier payloads to their targets and who can call in an airstrike to deal devastating damage in a wide swath across the battlefield. Craft a strategy suited to your specific playstyle and devastate your opponents!

Features:

  • Up to 8 players in online battles
  • 8 unique commanders each with unique strategies and abilities
  • 18 different and unique units spread across infantry, vehicles, and air
  • Built-in map editor
  • Ranked matchmaking
  • Custom game lobbies
  • Replays
  • Observers
  • Single player and co-op against the AI
  • Cross-platform with mobile
  • Touch-friendly interface for even playing field with mouse and keyboard

Micro Wars is a passion project with a small development team.

data.short_description: Micro Wars is a fast-paced real time strategy game that throws you into the action in short, intense online battles featuring up to 8 players. Tailor your strategy with a variety of commanders, build your base, mine some minerals, and micro your way to victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel I3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
